title: Being treated unfairly at work increases risk of long-term sick leave

title_detail.value: Being treated unfairly at work increases risk of long-term sick leave

summary: Staff who feel they are treated unfairly at work are at increased risk of being off sick more frequently and for longer, according to new research.
